name: Greek Salad
steps: Chop ingredients, drizzle oil, sprinkle salt, mix well.

name: Chicken Pasta
steps: Boil pasta, cook chicken, mix with tomato sauce and season with salt.

name: Pancakes
steps: Mix eggs and milk, add a pinch of salt, pour batter on pan, flip when golden.

name: Vegetable Soup
steps: Boil vegetables, add tomato sauce and salt, simmer until cooked.

name: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast bread, add mashed avocado on top, drizzle olive oil, sprinkle salt.

name: Grilled Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken with olive oil and salt, grill for 20 minutes.

name: Fruit Smoothie
steps: Blend fruits with milk, yogurt, banana, and honey. Serve cold.

name: Chocolate Cake
steps: Mix ingredients, bake at 180Â°C for 30 minutes.

name: Caesar Salad
steps: Mix lettuce, grilled chicken, feta, croutons, add olive oil and salt.
